content.text:
# ASTRA Award for Favourite Program

}}
}}
The ASTRA Award for Favourite Program is an award presented at the ASTRA Awards since 2004.
Overview
; Award titles:
* Favourite Australian Production (2004)
* Favourite Program (2005â€“present)
